price: جا من دیارییەکی بەنرخ و گەورەیان بۆ دەنێرم ئەمجا چاوەڕوان دەکەم کەنێردراوەکان بەچیەوە دەگەڕێنەوە
arabic: وَإِنِّي مُرۡسِلَةٌ إِلَيۡهِم بِهَدِيَّةٖ فَنَاظِرَةُۢ بِمَ يَرۡجِعُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-innī mur'silatun ilayhim bihadiyyatin fanāẓiratun bima yarjiʿu al-mur'salūna
